index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement for and acceptance of financial assistance from the United States of America Department of Housing and Urban Development for the Atlas Hotel Rehabilitation Project for Single Room Occupancy Housing; authorizing implementation thereof by the Department of Community Development and implementing agreements; creating a position and increasing expenditure allowances in the 1980 Budget of the Department of Community Development and making appropriations.
